configVersion.description: The version of the config. It can be used to tell Neuro's Canvas how to read the config.

settings.description: Settings to control the behaviour of the canvas.

allowed_save_file_formats.description: File formats that Neuro is allowed to save in.

canvas_size.description: Canvas size on startup. Setting either unit to 0 will prompt Neuro to input her decision on that dimension.

permissions.description: Permissions that dictate what Neuro can do.

layers.description: Whether to grant access to layering actions.

background.description: Grant Neuro access to the background layer.

base.description: Grant Neuro access to the base layer

custom.description: Let Neuro create and modify her own layers.

misc.description: Whether to grant access to various miscellaneous actions.

bucket.description: Whether to allow Neuro to cover a section with a specific colour.

undo.description: Whether to allow Neuro to undo her mistakes.

export.description: Whether to allow Neuro to save her file. To restrict the list of file types she can save, refer to settings.allowed_save_file_formats

draw.description: Whether to allow her to draw with various presets.

line.description: Whether to allow her to draw a straight line.

line_sequence.description: Whether to allow her to draw a sequence of straight lines.

curve.description: Whether to allow her to draw a curve.

circle.description: Whether to allow her to draw a circle.

triangle.description: Whether to allow her to draw a triangle.

rectangle.description: Whether to allow her to draw a rectangle.

brush.description: Whether to allow her to change the colour of her brush.
